title: Bug 123044 - Missing Page Break in First Item When Previewing PDF
description: This bug report is related to the issue where the first item does not have a page break when previewing an attached file in PDF format.
OB: The observed behavior is that when previewing the attached file in PDF, the first item does not have a page break as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that the first item should have a page break when previewing an attached file in PDF format.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the attached file from bug report 1228982 in a PDF viewer and preview it.
